# PLAYER::NETWORK_PLAYER_ID_TO_INT

## Summary
Returns the player index for the main player as an int

## Returns
* **INT**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Does exactly the same thing as PLAYER_ID()
